info.name: Gadai Top API
info.description: Complete API collection for Gadai Top backend with authentication, authorization, and CRUD operations

request.description: Login with email and password. Optional macAddress for device verification.
Logout current user and invalidate token
Reset password using token from email
Update company interest and fee configuration

query.description: Filter by status (draft, pending_approval, active, inactive)

request.description: List all branches with optional filters

body.raw:
{
  "branchCode": "BR001",
  "shortName": "Jakarta Pusat",
  "fullName": "Cabang Jakarta Pusat",
  "address": "Jl. Sudirman No. 1",
  "phone": "+6281234567890",
  "city": "Jakarta",
  "companyId": "company-uuid-here",
  "isBorrowed": false
}

{
  "shortName": "Updated Short Name",
  "fullName": "Updated Full Name",
  "address": "Updated Address",
  "phone": "+6281234567891",
  "city": "Updated City"
}

request.description: Approve a borrow request (Pinjam PT) for a branch
Reject a borrow request (Pinjam PT) for a branch
Get item type details by ID
List all registered devices for a user
Register a new device for a user (MAC address locking)

query.description: Filter by action (create, update, delete, login, logout, password_change, status_change)

request.description: List audit logs with optional filters
Get audit log details by ID
Get borrow request details by ID
Create a new borrow request (Pinjam PT)
Reject a borrow request with reason
Check API and database health status

item.name: SPK (Pawn Agreements)

request.description: Extend SPK period by paying interest
Redeem pawned items by paying full amount
Get all NKB records for this SPK

item.description: SPK (Surat Perjanjian Kredit) - Pawn Agreement management

request.description: Scan KTP (ID card) to extract customer data

item.name: NKB (Transaction Records)

request.description: List all NKB (Nota Kredit Barang) records

item.description: NKB (Nota Kredit Barang) - Transaction record management

request.description: Get price history for catalog item

item.name: Auction Batches
item.description: Auction batch management for expired pawn items

request.description: Get current cash balance for a branch

item.name: Reports

request.description: Get mutation report by branch (supports CSV export)

item.description: Business reports (supports JSON and CSV export)

request.description: Get presigned URL for file upload
Get public URL for uploaded file
Check if S3 upload is configured
Get a specific link by ID
